types.html:
jouer sur du velours

  1. (figuratively) to play it safe, not to take any risk
  2. (figuratively) to be onto a sure thing, to have it made, to have it all tied up, to have it easy
trans: to play it safe, not to take any risk
to be onto a sure thing, to have it made, to have it all tied up, to have it easy
